title: Customize your Shark Watch : How To
description:
Did you know??? You can customize your Shark Watch in only a few small steps!

Mix, Match, Trade and Customize! 

Step 1: Unscrew the 4 top screws
Step 2: Take off the face plate
Step 3: Pop off the band
Step 4: Swap parts with your friends
Step 5: Put it back together

It's really not rocket science.
All you need is a screwdriver and an imagination.

See all the Shark Watch colors: freestyleusa.com/products/shark.php

asset.author: Freestyle U.S.A.
